annotations.title: Basic Cocktails - Mulled Wine (Glögg and Feuerzangenbowle)

textContent:
2 750ml bottles pinot noir
4 oz Aquavit or vodka
2 oz Ruby Port
5 cinnamon sticks
12 cloves
4 cardamom pods
1 nutmeg
3/4 cup sugar (demerara)
zest of one orange

Simmer for 30 minutes (don't boil)
Refrigerate overnight. 
Strain out, reheat, and serve
Top with raisins and sliced almonds. 

---

2 750 ml bottles of dry red wine
5 cinnamon sticks
8 cloves
1 cup orange juice
1/4 cup lemon juice
8 orange slices
8 lemon slices

Stir and simmer
Place sugar cone above punch, soak in high proof rum, and light up.
